ROOT.GetLineLoadRate: select L.CLOUDID,R.LASTTIME,R.LASTVALUE from MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCFINIALVALUE_SD R JOIN MONITORSIGNAL.B_DEVICE_SD L ON R.DEV_ID=L.DEV_ID WHERE MEASTYPE='电流值' AND L.DTID=1 AND L.CLOUDID IS NOT NULL UNION ALL select L.CLOUDID,R.LASTTIME,R.LASTVALUE from MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCFINIALVALUE_RZ R JOIN MONITORSIGNAL.B_DEVICE_RZ L ON R.DEV_ID=L.DEV_ID WHERE MEASTYPE='电流值' AND L.DTID=1 AND L.CLOUDID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetLineInfo: SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,P.IMAXLONG_20 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P P ON L.ID=P.ID WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND P.IMAXLONG_20 IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID,P.IH FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_P P ON L.ID=P.ID WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND P.IH IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetLineInfo1: SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_INFO) UNION ALL SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE,L.START_ST_ID,L.END_ST_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L WHERE L.START_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.END_ST_ID IS NOT NULL AND L.ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_LINE_INFO)
ROOT.GetTransLoad: select T.CLOUDID,R.LASTTIME,R.LASTVALUE from MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCFINIALVALUE_SD R JOIN MONITORSIGNAL.B_DEVICE_SD T ON R.DEV_ID=T.DEV_ID WHERE MEASTYPE='有功功率' AND T.DTID=3 AND T.CLOUDID IS NOT NULL UNION ALL select T.CLOUDID,R.LASTTIME,R.LASTVALUE from MONITORSIGNAL.TBYCFINIALVALUE_RZ R JOIN MONITORSIGNAL.B_DEVICE_RZ T ON R.DEV_ID=T.DEV_ID WHERE MEASTYPE='有功功率' AND T.DTID=3 AND T.CLOUDID IS NOT NULL
ROOT.GetTransInfo: select ID,NAME,ST_ID,MVA_RATE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_B T ORDER BY ID
ROOT.GetLoadValue: SELECT to_char(m.dayid,'hh24:mi'),m.id,m.v00, n.v00 FROM ( select dayid, aa.id,aa.v00 from (select * from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_H1_MEA_{{0}} where id={1} and create_time>={2} and create_time<{3})aa right join ( SELECT rownum,TO_DATE('2019-10-30', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + (ROWNUM-1) units hour as dayid FROM sysmaster: sysshmvals CONNECT BY level <= 24) da on aa.create_time=da.dayid ) m left join (select to_date(create_time,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi') as create_time,id,v00 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_H1_MEA_{{0}} where id={1} and create_time>={4} and create_time<{3} ) n on m.dayid=n.create_time

Transfmwd.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_H1_MEA_{0} WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001'
Transfmwd.Load:
SELECT s.ID,s.LONGITUDE,s.LATITUDE,V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59,t.MVA_RATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_H1_MEA_{1} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_B t ON m.ID=t.ID JOIN (
select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B ) s ON t.ST_ID=s.ID WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND m.CREATE_TIME={0} AND t.MVA_RATE>0
Transfmwd.GetLoadRate: SELECT T.TRANSFM_ID,M.CREATE_TIME,round(M.V00/T.MVA_RATE,4) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TRANSFMWD_REALTIME_MEA M JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_B T ON M.TRANSFMWD_ID=T.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_PWRTRANSFM_B TR ON T.TRANSFM_ID=TR.ID WHERE T.WIND_TYPE=1001 AND TR."USAGE"<>2002 AND T.NAME LIKE '%高' AND M.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND T.MVA_RATE>0
Transfmwd.GetPSLoadRate: SELECT s.ID,s.LONGITUDE,s.LATITUDE,round(M.V00/T.MVA_RATE,4) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TRANSFMWD_REALTIME_MEA M JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_TRANSFMWD_B T ON M.TRANSFMWD_ID=T.ID JOIN ( select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B union ALL select ID,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B ) s ON t.ST_ID=s.ID WHERE M.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND T.MVA_RATE>0 AND M.V00 IS NOT NULL

Generator.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H1_MEA_{0} WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001'
Generator.Load: SELECT p.ID,p.LONGITUDE,p.LATITUDE,V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59,g.MVA_RATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_H1_MEA_{1} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_GENERATOR_B g ON m.ID=g.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B p ON g.ST_ID=p.ID WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND m.CREATE_TIME={0} AND g.MVA_RATE>0

Line.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_{0} WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001'
Line.LoadValue: SELECT V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59 FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_{0} m join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINEEND_B l on m.ACLINEEND_ID = l.ID WHERE MEAS_TYPE='00002001' AND l.LINE_ID={1}

NewEnergy.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_H1_MEA_{0} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B p ON m.ID=p.ID WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND p.plant_type BETWEEN 1004 AND 1005
NewEnergy.Load: SELECT p.ID,p.LONGITUDE,p.LATITUDE,V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59,s.CAPACITY FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_H1_MEA_{1} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B p ON m.ID=p.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S s ON p.ID=s.ID AND s.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND s.STATE_CODE=1003 WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND m.CREATE_TIME={0} AND s.CAPACITY>0 AND p.plant_type BETWEEN 1004 AND 1005

AllLoad.MaxTime: SELECT MAX(CREATE_TIME) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_H1_MEA_{0} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B p ON m.ID=p.ID WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND p.plant_type BETWEEN 1004 AND 1005
AllLoad.Load: SELECT p.ID,p.LONGITUDE,p.LATITUDE,V00,V01,V02,V03,V04,V05,V06,V07,V08,V09,V10,V11,V12,V13,V14,V15,V16,V17,V18,V19,V20,V21,V22,V23,V24,V25,V26,V27,V28,V29,V30,V31,V32,V33,V34,V35,V36,V37,V38,V39,V40,V41,V42,V43,V44,V45,V46,V47,V48,V49,V50,V51,V52,V53,V54,V55,V56,V57,V58,V59,s.CAPACITY FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_H1_MEA_{1} m JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B p ON m.ID=p.ID JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S s ON p.ID=s.ID AND s.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND s.STATE_CODE=1003 WHERE m.MEAS_TYPE='30022001' AND m.CREATE_TIME={0} AND s.CAPACITY>0 AND p.plant_type BETWEEN 1004 AND 1005
